quote: Yet I am not writing with ordinary ink, but with red blood that dripsfrom my heart. All its wounds long scarred over have opened and itthrobs and hurts, and now and then a tear falls on the paper.
quote_letters: YET I AM NOT WRITING WITH ORDINARY INK BUT WITH RED BLOOD THAT DRIPSFROM MY HEART ALL ITS WOUNDS LONG SCARRED OVER HAVE OPENED AND ITTHROBS AND HURTS AND NOW AND THEN A TEAR FALLS ON THE PAPER
